name: Robot Hate
description: A third person brawler set in a futuristic city that involves the player attempting to kill civilians and police to increase their score. The player plays as a robot that runs around a city attempting to cause as much carnage as possible. The game's mechanics fundamentals include punching and kicking, which while moving around can cause a lot of damage. The player will also have enormous amounts of pleasure destroying other objects as well, like cars, which explode when they are punched. The object of the game is for the player to reach the highest score possible within the life that they are allotted. The game provides endless entertainment to the player.
